markdownEnumDescriptions: A single colored letter, similar to the built-in Default and Adaptive themes
kind_icons_style.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for the kind icons which are shown in the autocompletion popup and the "Goto Symbol" panels.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

kind_letters.deprecationMessage:
This setting is deprecated!
Use "kind_icons_style": "letters" instead.

sidebar_status_colors.markdownDescription:
Highlight filenames in the sidebar for files with Git status "new" or "modified" in green and orange. Regardless of this setting, files with status "ignored" are always dimmed.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

git_status_icons.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for the git status icons for files and folders in the sidebar.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

hide_sidebar_status_icons.deprecationMessage:
This setting is deprecated!
Use "git_status_icons": "disabled" instead.

tab_shadows.markdownDescription:
Whether to draw shadows and a thin border for file tabs.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

inactive_tab_transparency.markdownDescription:
Makes inactive tabs transparent, similar to how they are displayed in the Default and Adaptive themes.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

blend_inactive_tabs.deprecationMessage:
This setting is deprecated!
Use "inactive_tab_transparency" instead.

tooltip_style.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for tooltips.

Upvote https://github.com/sublimehq/sublime_text/issues/4683 on GitHub if you would prefer that the style should be automatically derived from the color scheme.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

popup_style.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for hover popups.

Options: `"plain"`, `"rounded"` or `"square"`. When set to `"rounded"` or `"square"`, popups will be drawn with a border.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

fold_buttons_style.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for the buttons shown in the gutter to fold regions of text.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

hide_tabs_dropdown_button.markdownDescription:
Hides the tabs dropdown button.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

markdownEnumDescriptions: The original scroll bars from Adobe Brackets
The default scroll bars from Sublime Text
Thin scroll bars that expand on hover
Uses `"sublime"` when overlay scroll bars are enabled, and `"brackets"` when disabled
scroll_bar_style.markdownDescription:
Controls the style for scroll bars. Options are:

- `"brackets"`
- `"sublime"`
- `"thin"`
- `"auto"`

The `"auto"` option uses `"sublime"` when overlay scroll bars are enabled, and `"brackets"` when disabled.

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*

theme_variant.markdownDescription:
Provides an alternative style for the title bar, the side bar, and a few other UI elements (experimental).

Setting from: *Theme - Brackets*
